title: Devcon #4 - Péter Szilágyi | Building Geth
itunes:title: Devcon #4 - Péter Szilágyi | Building Geth
description:
Welcome to Devcon 6. The first Devcon for Bankless, the conference was a ton of fun and an amazing cultural experience in Bogota, Colombia.

Péter Szilágyi is a Core Developer for Ethereum, building the Geth client. One of the most important people in the Ethereum ecosystem, Peter has been tirelessly building critical infrastructure for the last 8 years.

------
📣 Push | Try the Communication Protocol of Web3
https://bankless.cc/Push

------

🦁 BRAVE | THE BROWSER NATIVE WALLET
https://bankless.cc/Brave

💠 NEXO | CRYPTO FINANCIAL HUB
https://bankless.cc/Nexo

🔐 LEDGER | NANO HARDWARE WALLETS
https://bankless.cc/Ledger

⚡️FUEL | THE MODULAR EXECUTION LAYER
https://bankless.cc/Fuelpod

17:09 Ethereum’s Weaknesses
